definition: on top/upon/above/upper/previous/first (of multiple parts)/to climb/to get onto/to go up/to attend (class or university)
adornment/to adorn/dress/clothing/costume (of an actor in a play)/to play a role/to pretend/to install/to fix/to wrap (sth in a bag)/to load/to pack

sentences.english: Carrie had thought of going for a walk, and had put on a light grey woollen dress with a jaunty double-breasted jacket.
sentences.chinese: 她已穿上淡灰羊毛女裝，外罩一件時髦的雙排扣上裝。

sentences.english: The ceiling light is now covered with a white globe.
sentences.chinese: 現在那盞吊燈上裝了一個球形燈罩。

sentences.english: The Christmas tree was decorated with coloured lights.
I put the silencer on my gun and Jeff did the same.
sentences.chinese: 我在槍上裝上消聲器，傑夫也把消音器安好。

sentences.english: I noticed a woman on the factory floor putting nozzles onto rubber hoses.
sentences.chinese: 我注意到一位女士在車間裏正往塑料軟管上裝噴嘴。

sentences.english: The utility model still uses the base structure that a threshing wheel drum and a shed cover are installed on a threshing stirring barrel.
sentences.chinese: 沿用在打穀拌桶上裝打穀輪鼓及棚蓋的基本結構。

sentences.english: Pull out your best jeans and most attractive tops.
sentences.chinese: 拋開你漂亮的牛仔和最好的上裝。

sentences.english: Install a filter in your showerhead, too, to be really green.
sentences.chinese: 在你的蓮蓬頭上裝一臺淨化器也是綠色的選擇。

sentences.english: The windows had iron bars on them leaving only one door to escape the inferno.
sentences.chinese: 窗戶上裝着鐵欄杆，只留下一道門讓人逃離這座地獄。

sentences.english: The tower is surmounted with a spire.
David's headlights were fitted with blackout masks, but he drove very fast just the same.
sentences.chinese: 雖然前燈上裝着閉燈罩，大衛仍驅車如飛。

sentences.english: Each pellet is mounted on an adhesive sheet with back electrode side up.
sentences.chinese: 每粒晶片底電極面朝上裝在粘性膜上。

sentences.english: They put a tap on his telephone and recorded all his calls.
sentences.chinese: 他們在他的電話上裝上了竊聽器，錄下了所有通話。
上裝過於濃豔看上去不自然。

sentences.english: On the top of the highest building, install a surveillance camera to surveille the whole city.
sentences.chinese: 在都會最高的樓製造上裝一個監控器，監視整個都會。

sentences.english: You can get UV filtering film for your car windows.
sentences.chinese: 你可以在車窗上裝上紫外線濾鏡。

definition: cupboard/cupboard that can also be used as a table/sideboard
